Guide

Guide Description
Install How to install Kf locally using a single-file import or NPM
Animation Map Format Learn about the common map format all mixins rely
Using Mixins How to use and nest the provided set of mixins
Easing Animations Learn how to set the easing between keyframe states
Pipeline Functions Apply a global processing function to all animations on your site
Example Animations A few example animations showing mixin composability
